content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on the size and location, I was thinking a monthly rental price of 600 Euros would be reasonable. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros. Thank you very much for your understanding.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Thank you for choosing to rent from me. I look forward to your tenancy.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you very much for your assistance. Can you give me a written contract?

I would also like to know if there is a penalty for early termination of the contract.

How long is the lease term?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Certainly, Nesibe. I can provide you with a written contract once the lease agreement is finalized.

Regarding early termination of the contract, I do have a penalty clause in place that would require the tenant to pay a penalty fee equivalent to one month's rent if they choose to terminate the contract before the end of the lease term.

The lease term for this apartment is one year, with the option to renew for another year.
name: Heinrich Heine
